title: FundTrack - Approve Before Spend
description: Donors, UN & NGOs receive accounts after funds are spent, when the horse is out of the barn. Leaving them few options to control RoI.
solution: An Atala blockchain, a mobile app UX like Revolut, metadata and smart contracts (documenting the normal procurement / purchasing process.
experience: 30 years building and managing successful businesses. 12 years watching the NGO community consume grant funds, reporting after spending.
